page.title: 14Education
page.content:
There are three schools in {Yaxley}: Yaxley County Infants School: This is a modern open-plan infant school for children from 4 to 7 which opened in Febuary 1973.Classes are arranged acording to ages. The school comprises six home bays with adjoining cloak rooms and toilets.Three resource areas which are used for a variety of practical and creative activities and a well stocked libary. There is a large playroom several quiet rooms and an enclosed room for T.V. and slides.
Yaxley C. Of E. Junior School ----------------------------- Built in 1968 as a Church of England Aided Junior School it serves the area of the village to the south,but not including Broadway. Children from other areas can be admitted on religious grounds
